channel.title: Item Clicked

item.title: Item Clicked
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Okay, I added an item into the potions class; I actually added two. So, the problem is that it won’t do what I coded it to do. The other one does. One is a casket, and the other one is a custom. case 405: c.sM("You're Gay"); break; case 10071://Terrorbird if(c.playerLevel[23] >= 93 && c.sumNpc == 0) { c.SummonNewNPC(136, "TerrorBird"); c.deleteItem(10071, slot, 1); c.addSkillXP((100000), 23); c.sumNpc = 1; } else if(c.playerLevel[23] < 93 && c.sumNpc == 0){ c.sM("You already summoned an familiar!"); c.sM("Relog, or kill your current familiar."); } else if(c.playerLevel[23] < 93 && c.sumNpc == 0) { c.sM("You need a summoning level of 93."); } else if(c.playerLevel[23] < 93 && c.sumNpc != 0) { c.sM("You already summoned an familiar!"); c.sM("Relog, or kill your current familiar."); c.sM("You need a summoning level of 93."); } break;
The casket works, but the summoning pouch doesn’t. Any help please?

Read full topic
